summary: A dark color scheme, 256 color terminals
name: tchaba
description:
Some screenshots of the scheme:

C
http://img718.imageshack.us/img718/4649/21984810.png

Perl
http://img835.imageshack.us/img835/8715/perl.png

Assembly
http://img85.imageshack.us/img85/5391/assembly.png
install_details:
- Set  "t_Co"  to 256 in ~/.vimrc to make Vim use 256 colors:
set t_Co=256

- Copy this script to your ~/.vim/colors.
